reuters.title: ENSERCH <ENS> TO REDEEM DEBENTURES
reuters.body: Enserch Corp said it called for redemption on May 4, 1987, all of its outstanding 16-3/4 pct sinking fund debentures due 2007. The redemption is pursuant to the optional redemption provisions of the indenture at a price of 111.981 pct of part. Reuter 
